nayuta_description: A powerful search engine with advanced operators and intelligent ranking.
feature_operators_desc: Use site:, filetype:, intitle:, inurl:, daterange:, and more to refine your searches.
feature_phrase_desc: Use quotes to search for exact phrases in your results.
feature_exclude_desc: Use minus sign (-) to exclude specific terms from results.
feature_boolean_desc: Combine terms with AND/OR for complex queries.
feature_graph_desc: Visualize connections between search results in an interactive graph.
feature_explanations_desc: See detailed scoring breakdowns for each search result.
feature_history_desc: Track your searches and quickly revisit previous queries.
feature_multilingual_desc: Available in English, 日本語, 中文, 한국어, Bahasa Melayu, and தமிழ்.
quick_start_1: Enter your search query in the search box above
quick_start_2: Click the "?" button for advanced search operators help
quick_start_3: Enable "Show result explanations" to understand ranking scores
quick_start_4: Click "View Graph" to visualize result relationships
quick_start_5: Your search history is saved locally for quick access
